mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(content_idx, title, writer_idx, count, board_idx, content) VALUES(#{content_idx},#{title},#{writer_idx},#{count},#{board_idx},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT content_idx, title, name, DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%y-%m-%d') AS regDate, count FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.writer_idx = u.userno WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
SELECT board_idx, content_idx, title, name, DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%y-%m-%d') AS regDate, count FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.writer_idx = u.userno ORDER BY count DESC limit 5
SELECT board_idx, content_idx, title, name, DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%y-%m-%d') AS regDate, count FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.writer_idx = u.userno ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT content_idx, title, name, DATE_FORMAT(regDate,'%y-%m-%d') AS regDate, count, content, writer_idx FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.writer_idx = u.userno WHERE content_idx = #{content_idx}
